Name: Lonecastle
About the game: Fight for glory, brave and courageous warriors. Challenge other players in this colorful game by beating their score and become the king!! Lonecastle is a top-down shooter where the player attempts to survive countless enemies. Defend your little castle from the incessant waves of enemy ships and soldiers. Collect gold and gain experience to improve your castle.
